title: The Long Wastes
blocka: Action: (Sunrider Aid) Spend 3 mana to place progress equal to Sunrider Disposition on any ongoing wilderness challenge.

title: White Sands
blocka: Action: Test Lore. Lower discord pool by one for each success.
blockb: (CALAMITY) A character at this location is Weary.

title: Moonriders
blockc: (SNEAKY) +3 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.
blockd: Special: Discard if Pelakhar challenge is revealed.

title: Naked and Afraid
blockc: Immediate: Spend 9 progress. Move to stage 1. Burn card.

title: Moonriders
blockc: (QUICK) +4 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.
blockd: Special: Discard if Pelakhar challenge is revealed.

title: Ley Lines
blockc: Immediate: Spend 11 progress. Move to stage 2. Burn card.

title: Pelakhar
blockc: Immediate: Spend 13 progress. Complete mission path. Burn card.

title: Breath of Flame
blockb: Action: Test Lore 4. Success: Discard. Failure: +2 Discord.

title: Steel Maw
blockb: Action: Test Combat 3. Success: Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (FORCEFUL) +3 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Tail Whip
blockb: Action: Test Combat 3. Success: Discard. Failure: +1 Discord.
blockc: (QUICK) +4 Discord. Defense: Combat. If in staging area, move to occupied mission location.

title: Mana Rifts
blocka: Interrupt: +2 Mana. Roll dice and add to pool.

title: Dragon Fear
blocka: Immediate: Give one character on quest a psyche condition or move one character on quest to spotlight location.
